author: danielsh
msg: On the fs-successor-ids branch, sketch out a public API.
This adds an svn_fs_history_next() API, as a counterpart to
svn_fs_history_prev().  The exact semantics of this API may change,
but in the meantime this will allow for exercising the new functionality
without manually inspecting the filesystem's internals.
The former is written to mirror svn_fs_history_prev(), and documented
to be unimplemented for pre-1.8 filesystems.
Implement the new FSAP API as "Not implemented".

author: jleroux
msg: "Applied fix from trunk for revision: 1167510"  (it seems R10.04 still miss OfbizSetupSecurityData, but not sure...)
A patch from Marcelo Giubergia "ofbizsetup "INSERT CARRIER_SHIPMENT_METHOD" ERROR when new store is created" script" https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-4381
I installed ofbiz from scratch according with recommended method
Then, when I create an store by https://localhost:8443/ofbizsetup/control/createProductStore

Error: Error parsing entity xml file: org.ofbiz.entity.GenericEntityException: Error while inserting: [GenericEntity:CarrierShipmentMethod][createdStamp,2011-08-29 11:16:33.247(java.sql.Timestamp)][createdTxStamp,2011-08-29 11:16:32.951(java.sql.Timestamp)][lastUpdatedStamp,2011-08-29 11:16:33.247(java.sql.Timestamp)][lastUpdatedTxStamp,2011-08-29 11:16:32.951(java.sql.Timestamp)][partyId,sds(java.lang.String)][roleTypeId,CARRIER(java.lang.String)][sequenceNumber,4(java.lang.Long)][shipmentMethodTypeId,LOCAL_DELIVERY(java.lang.String)] (SQL Exception while executing the following:INSERT INTO public.CARRIER_SHIPMENT_METHOD (SHIPMENT_METHOD_TYPE_ID, PARTY_ID, ROLE_TYPE_ID, SEQUENCE_NUMBER, CARRIER_SERVICE_CODE, LAST_UPDATED_STAMP, LAST_UPDATED_TX_STAMP, CREATED_STAMP, CREATED_TX_STAMP) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?) (ERROR: inserción o actualización en la tabla «carrier_shipment_method» viola la llave foránea «carr_shmeth_type»
Detail: La llave (shipment_method_type_id)=(LOCAL_DELIVERY) no está presente en la tabla «shipment_method_type».)) calling service parseEntityXmlFile in importTempDataFile
